Package ch.zhaw.it.pm3.spacerunner.technicalservices.persistence.util

Class JsonPersistenceUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.zhaw.it.pm3.spacerunner.technicalservices.persistence.util.JsonPersistenceUtil
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Persistence
    public class JsonPersistenceUtil
extends java.lang.Object
implements Persistence
    Utility tool to persist data (load / save) with Gson-library Implemented with the singleton-pattern

        public int getAmountOfCoinsNeededToBuyContent​(int price)

      • buyContent

        public void buyContent​(ContentId contentId,
                       int price)
        Buys the content with the specified content if. => Subtracts coins from profile and adds the content to the profile.
        Specified by:
        buyContent in interface Persistence
        Parameters:
        contentId - content to add to profile. Not Null
        price - price of content. Has to be higher or equal zero

      • loadProfile

        public PlayerProfile loadProfile()
        Load the profile of the player from the disk where it is saved in json. If there is no profile.json found it will return a new default profile!
        Specified by:
        loadProfile in interface Persistence
        Returns:
        the player's profile (or a default profile if it doesn't exist)
